hero.title: Oracle Fusion Procurement Training With
hero.shortDescription: Advance your career in Procurement and Supply Chain Management with our expert-led Oracle Fusion Procurement Training! Learn core procurement modules, gain real-time hands-on experience, and build the skills needed to thrive in today’s dynamic procurement and sourcing landscape.

points: Final-year students or graduates from B.Tech, MBA, or related fields.

Business owners aiming to streamline procurement processes using Oracle.
Professionals looking to enhance procurement efficiency with Oracle’s advanced tools.

sectionOne.title: Meet Our Founder  & Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Krishna, a seasoned professional with 20 years of experience across diverse projects and industries, is driven by a passion for sharing knowledge and transforming students into skilled professionals. With a vision to produce top-tier Oracle Fusion Procurement consultants to meet the growing market demand, our founder firmly believes that knowledge is the key to individual financial growth, empowering people to support their families and contribute to the economy.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion Procurement Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion Procurement Training provides in-depth coverage of key modules including Purchasing, Sourcing, Supplier Portal, Procurement Contracts, Supplier Qualification Management (SQM), Product Management, Inventory Management, Cost Management, FBDI Templates, and OTBI Reports. For a detailed breakdown, please refer to the course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: The training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with each class lasting for 1 hour per day, designed to maintain an interactive and structured learning approach.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend batches. All live sessions are held Monday through Saturday to maintain consistency and learning flow.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for those who prefer self-paced learning. Please note that doubt clarification sessions are not available with self-paced training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer internships based on your performance in mock evaluations. This helps you gain hands-on experience with real-world Oracle Procurement Cloud scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Procurement Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, our Oracle Fusion Procurement course is designed as a complete learning package. Individual modules cannot be taken separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist in creating a job-ready resume tailored for Oracle Procurement Cloud roles. Our experts help you showcase your skills effectively.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, having a Laptop or Desktop is essential to access the Oracle Cloud instance and perform hands-on activities during the Oracle Cloud Procurement Training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for the Oracle Procurement Course?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required! We teach from the basics. However, prior knowledge of Supply Chain, Logistics, or Oracle EBS R12 is a plus. This Oracle Fusion Cloud Procurement course is suitable for all graduates, including B.Tech, PG, and Degree holders.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We begin from foundational topics and progress to advanced concepts, making this Oracle Fusion Procurement Training ideal for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide full job placement support including mock interviews, resume preparation, and career guidance. We are partnered with top companies like Evosys, Hitachi Vantara, NTT Data, LTI, FIS Global, AAIS, Tech Mahindra, and more.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Cloud Procurement Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the Oracle Cloud Procurement Certification process, including access to sample dumps and expert tips for successful exam preparation.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all session recordings will be available on our learning portal. Additionally, we provide soft copy study materials for each module, complete with screenshots and navigation steps.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we share module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interview sessions to help you crack job interviews with confidence.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 6 months of access to the Oracle instance. No installation is needed—access is provided via a secure URL.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once you enroll in the Oracle Fusion Procurement Online Training, you’ll receive a 1-year membership allowing you to attend multiple batches.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion, you will receive a Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Fusion Procurement.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding or programming knowledge is necessary. This is a fully functional, non-coding Oracle Procurement Training program.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personalized one-on-one training sessions upon request. Please note that pricing for these sessions differs from group training.
